name: Stranded (itch) (Lennyi)
description:
Stranded is a difficult platformer, even a rage game for the unskilled where you are left stranded in an isolated pit, and must climb a mountain to make the call for help.

-

This game was made as a challenge against Paolotto Games, with the theme of "Phone Call", provided by Dan. It took ~3 hours, 57 minutes and 45 seconds.

Controls:

  • Move - [Arrow Keys]
  • Jump - [Z]

Known Issues

  • Not playing in fullscreen may cause the camera to stretch and show the outside of the level - play in fullscreen.
